Install safety features in your living space, such as bumpers on furniture and padded floors.
Use a walker or crutches to move around, with proper training to avoid falls.
Communicate with others about your condition and ask for assistance when needed.
Use technology to monitor your surroundings and detect potential hazards, such as a motion sensor or a sound-based alarm.
Practice mindfulness and meditation to increase your awareness of your surroundings and avoid accidents.
